schedules_handling_rules.comment:
This is a config for the schedules. Events are the typical EC model events that lead to either enrolling or fulfilling a milestone. There are two sets of events (see types key), the ones that involved
					in enrolling into a milestone and those that are used in fulfilling a milestone. pass_logic can either be AND or OR. When it's AND all the conditions in the fields must be fulfilled and when OR either 
					of the fields values will lead to executing the action. enrollment_fields define the conditions that must be met for someone to enroll into a milestone from the events specified in the types key
